{{cpp/thread/shared_future/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl rev multi|num=1|since1=c++11|dcl1=
shared_future&amp; operator=( const shared_future&amp; other );
|since2=c++17|dcl2=
shared_future&amp; operator=( const shared_future&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|1=
shared_future&amp; operator=( shared_future&amp;&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Assigns the contents of another {{tt|shared_future}}.
@1@ Releases any shared state and assigns the contents of {{c|other}} to {{c|*this}}. After the assignment, {{c|this-&gt;valid() {{==}} other.valid()}}.
@2@ Releases any shared state and move-assigns the contents of {{c|other}} to {{c|*this}}. After the assignment, {{c|other.valid() {{==}} false}} and {{lc|valid|this-&gt;valid()}} will yield the same value as {{c|other.valid()}} before the assignment.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|a {{tt|std::shared_future}} that will transfer state to {{c|*this}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
